Texts.Chs: 把3株^orange;拉德草^reset;带给这名科学家。（位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;）
Texts.Eng: Bring the 3 ^orange;Rad Leaf^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我正在研究的这种材料有辐射，但我没有防辐射服。所以，你可以帮我找一些^orange;拉德草^reset;吗？有了这种植物我才能进行下一步实验。
Texts.Eng: I'm trying to study this material but I have no radiation protection. Specifically, I would like some ^orange;Rad Leaf^reset; to ingest. Care to get me some?

Texts.Chs: 因为你帮了我，相等的，我也会给你应得的。这里是^green;一大袋像素^reset;。
Texts.Eng: It never hurts to help! And since you helped me, I'll help you. Here's a ^green;big bag of pixels^reset;!
